Pre-Game Insights: Will Riyan Parag make his international debut today?
Post-Match Reflections: India captain Shubman Gill was not impressed with his team's performance on the field and with the bat.
We bowled pretty well, we let ourselves down in the field. We were not up to standard and everyone looked a bit rusty

We spoke about taking time and enjoying our batting but it didn't pan out that way. Halfway through we had lost 5 wickets, would've been best for us if I stayed there till the end, very disappointed with the way I got out and the rest of the match panned out
There was a bit of hope for us but when you're chasing 115 and your no.10 batter is out there, you know something is wrong
India's first defeat in T20Is this year and it came after their WC-winning campaign. Zimbabwe have surely put an end to India's WC party
Miscellaneous Highlights: Shubman Gill was not impressed with his team's performance
Washington Sundar kept India alive in the game till the final over
Zimbabwe's Sikandar Raza and Co ended India's World Cup party with a historic win
